titles.title: Morris and Gwendolyn Cafritz Foundation Recognition Resolution of 2002
Recognizing the Morris and Gwendolyn Cafritz Foundation for its contributions to the arts and humanities, education, and community and health services in the Washington, D.C., metropolitan area.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/10/2002--Introduced. Morris and Gwendolyn Cafritz Foundation Recognition Resolution of 2002 - Recognizes the Morris and Gwendolyn Cafritz Foundation on the occasion of its being honored by the Summer Opera Theatre Company, at its 24th Annual Gala Dinner and Musicale, for contributions to the arts and humanities, education, and community and health services in the Washington, D.C., metropolitan area.
